name: Not Chess (AngryArugula, KetrinaDrawsALot, Curdle Games)
description:
Not Chess (AngryArugula, KetrinaDrawsALot, Curdle Games) is a puzzle game developed by AngryArugula, Curdle Games and KetrinaDrawsALot. It came out on 01-04-2021.
You can play Not Chess (AngryArugula, KetrinaDrawsALot, Curdle Games) on PC and Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
